Front_Yard.Body: You notice the neighboring human's cabin appears empty.

Front_Door.Body: You peek in the front door, and see the house is empty, you smell food inside, but have no idea how to get in.

Choices.Text: Check the back yard for a way in.

Porch.Body: The porch is sturdy, has a swing set for the human's entertainment, and some caged plants.
Porch.Body2: The porch is strewn with the remains of the caged plants you freed.

Choices.Text: Check the backyard for other options

Choices2.Text: Check the backyard for other options

Plants.Body: The plants are enclosed in a stone-like material, the humans are clearly fond of torture.

Choices.Text: Let them be, you're on a mission after all.

Destroy_Plants.Body: You shatter the plants cages, freeing them from oppression, and experiencing a cathartic release when doing so.

Enter_Front.Body: You attempt to use the key to unlock the door, and you succeed, smashing the door to bits.

Food_Get.Body: You eat to your hearts content, and bring some food back to your den. Mission Success.

Back_Yard.Body: The backyard seems bigger than the last time you were here, it seems like the humans have cut the grass. You notice a hot spring that the humans have built.

Choices.Text: Take a dip in the hot tub.
Head back to the front yard.
Enough relaxation for you, there's a heist to enact.

Music.Body: A symphony starts playing through the hot tub speakers.

Jets.Body: The jets in the tub fire up and soothe your muscles.

Contemplation.Body: As you relax in the hot tub, you question your reasoning for wanting to steal food from the humans, and what it means to be a bear at all.

Choices.Text: Choose peace, leave the humans to their food.
Choose cynicism, after all, a bear's gotta eat.

Back_Door.Body: You notice various objects meant to intimidate the wildlife on the porch, some sort of glowing purple effigy meant to destroy insects, and spikes strewn on the inside of the roof, surely meant to impale nesting birds. There is some sort of weird painted stone near the door.

Enter_Back.Body: You attempt to use the key to unlock the door, and you succeed, smashing the door to bits.

Stone.Body: The stone is smooth, but doesn't look like any stone you have seen before. It looks fake, like the humans have found a way to alchemize it.
Stone.Body2: The stone has been destroyed, and now you carry the key to enter the human's den.

Choices.Text: Leave the stone be, who knows what latent power it might hold.

Choices2.Text: Keep looking around the back door.

Hideakey.Body: Upon destroying this relic, you notice a glinting metal object, you've seen humans use this to gain access into their nest.

Key_Get.Body: You pick up the key in your mouth, it is cool to the touch, now we can try to gain access to the door.

Choices.Text: Try to access the back door.

Effigy.Body: The effigy is in the shape of an upside down pyramid. It glows with a faint purple light. You notice the heaps of insect corpses underneath the effigy, it's clear that this is an altar that humans make sacrifices to. It hums with power.

Choices.Text: Keep looking around the back door.

Offering.Body: You decided to make an offering to this deity that likely has given the humans their power. The greed for power overwhelms you.

Choices.Text: Destroy the effigy, its power is too great.

Fur.Body: You tear out a chunk of your fur with your teeth, and toss it towards the effigy. Causing the effigy to arc and pop with power. You can already feel the power coursing through you.

Choices.Text: Return to the back door, with your newfound power.

Vandal.Body: You take a swipe at the effigy with your paw, and it swings up into the air, and turns and flies towards you!

Good_End.Body: You choose to leave the humans to their devices, and seek food elsewhere, calling off what was sure to be the heist of the century.
